event.title: Join us for the Kick-off of Refund4Freedom in Italia (online)

body.p:
Weâ€™re excited to launch Refund4Freedom, a new campaign defending your rights to choose your operating system and claim refunds for unused pre-installed software.
Join us on May 29, 2025, as we kick off this important initiative that promotes device neutrality, consumer rights, and software freedom.
Learn how you can take action, share your story, get involved and help push manufacturers toward fairer, more transparent practices. Letâ€™s stand up for our freedom together!
